title: More joys of multiculturalism
author: VD
content_html:
How the New Britain supports British troops:
But all those third-worlders are needed for the jobs unemployed Britons won’t do, right? And there’s no difference between Anglican theists and other theists of an Abrahamic persuasion anyhow, right? Once more, it’s clear that Enoch Powell was precisely on target.
content_text:
How the New Britain
supports British troops
:
But all those third-worlders are needed for the jobs unemployed Britons won’t do, right?  And there’s no difference between Anglican theists and other theists of an Abrahamic persuasion anyhow, right?  Once more, it’s clear that Enoch Powell was precisely on target.
